code: import React from"react";import Button from"../../components/Button/Button";import Text from"../../components/Text/Text";import LinkExternal from"../../components/Link/LinkExternal";import Flex from"../../components/Box/Flex";import{Modal}from"../Modal";import CopyToClipboard from"./CopyToClipboard";import{connectorLocalStorageKey}from"./config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AccountModal=_ref=>{let{account,logout,onDismiss=()=>null}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{title:"Your wallet",onDismiss:onDismiss,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"20px",bold:true,style:{whiteSpace:"nowrap",overflow:"hidden",textOverflow:"ellipsis",marginBottom:"8px"},children:account}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{mb:"32px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinkExternal,{small:true,href:"https://etherscan.io/address/".concat(account),mr:"16px",children:"View on EtherScan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CopyToClipboard,{toCopy:account,children:"Copy Address"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{justifyContent:"center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{scale:"sm",variant:"secondary",onClick:()=>{logout();window.localStorage.removeItem(connectorLocalStorageKey);onDismiss();},children:"Logout"})})]});};export default AccountModal;
